name: LiveLikeaBoss
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Daily content to help business owners, sales professionals and entrepreneurs create a better life around their business. Tapping into topics like clarity, schedule optimization and productivity, this flash briefing will provide applicable and useful information to build more life in your work/life balance.
